params._trustedCaller: Address that has access to certain methods.     Set once on deployment and can't be changed.

createEVMScript(address,bytes).details: note that the arrays below has one extra element to store limit enforcement calls

params._evmScriptCallData: Encoded tuple: (address[] recipients, uint256[] amounts) where recipients - addresses of recipients to top up amounts - corresponding amounts of token to transfer
Encoded tuple: (address[] recipients, uint256[] amounts) where recipients - addresses of recipients to top up amounts - corresponding amounts of token to transfer

returns.recipients: Addresses of recipients to top up

createEVMScript(address,bytes).notice: Creates EVMScript to top up allowed recipients addresses

decodeEVMScriptCallData(bytes).notice: Decodes call data used by createEVMScript method
